long_description: During a day on the water or out in the mountains you may encounter anything from driving rain to glaring sun. Be ready for anything with the versatile Outdoor Research SunShower sombrero. Removable Ventia(TM) rain cover offers waterproof, breathable protection when it rains; rain cover stows in its own pocket when not needed. Remove the rain cover when the sun comes out to expose the mesh side panels to allow cool airflow. With a UPF 30 rating, fabric provides very good protection against harmful ultraviolet rays. Foam-stiffened brim floats in water. Adjust the fit with the external drawcord. Removable chin cord keeps the Outdoor Research SunShower sombrero on your head when the wind picks up.
short_description: During a day on the water or out in the mountains you may encounter anything from driving rain to glaring sun. Be ready for anything with the versatile Outdoor Research SunShower sombrero.
